name: Stealth Falcon
descr: [Stealth Falcon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0038) is a threat group that has conducted targeted spyware attacks against Emirati journalists, activists, and dissidents since at least 2012. Circumstantial evidence suggests there could be a link between this group and the United Arab Emirates (UAE) government, but that has not been confirmed. (Citation: Citizen Lab Stealth Falcon May 2016)

subtechniques.name: Web Protocols
subtechniques.descr: [Stealth Falcon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0038) malware communicates with its C2 server via HTTPS.(Citation: Citizen Lab Stealth Falcon May 2016)

technique_table_data.name: Command and Scripting Interpreter
technique_table_data.descr: [Stealth Falcon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0038) malware uses WMI to script data collection and command execution on the victim.(Citation: Citizen Lab Stealth Falcon May 2016)

subtechniques.name: PowerShell
subtechniques.descr: [Stealth Falcon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0038) malware uses PowerShell commands to perform various functions, including gathering system information via WMI and executing commands from its C2 server.(Citation: Citizen Lab Stealth Falcon May 2016)

technique_table_data.name: Credentials from Password Stores

subtechniques.name: Credentials from Web Browsers
subtechniques.descr: [Stealth Falcon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0038) malware gathers passwords from multiple sources, including Internet Explorer, Firefox, and Chrome.(Citation: Citizen Lab Stealth Falcon May 2016)

subtechniques.name: Windows Credential Manager
subtechniques.descr: [Stealth Falcon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0038) malware gathers passwords from the Windows Credential Vault.(Citation: Citizen Lab Stealth Falcon May 2016)

technique_table_data.descr: [Stealth Falcon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0038) malware gathers passwords from multiple sources, including Windows Credential Vault and Outlook.(Citation: Citizen Lab Stealth Falcon May 2016)

technique_table_data.name: Data from Local System
technique_table_data.descr: [Stealth Falcon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0038) malware gathers data from the local victim system.(Citation: Citizen Lab Stealth Falcon May 2016)

subtechniques.name: Symmetric Cryptography
subtechniques.descr: [Stealth Falcon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0038) malware encrypts C2 traffic using RC4 with a hard-coded key.(Citation: Citizen Lab Stealth Falcon May 2016)

technique_table_data.name: Exfiltration Over C2 Channel
technique_table_data.descr: After data is collected by [Stealth Falcon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0038) malware, it is exfiltrated over the existing C2 channel.(Citation: Citizen Lab Stealth Falcon May 2016)

technique_table_data.name: Process Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [Stealth Falcon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0038) malware gathers a list of running processes.(Citation: Citizen Lab Stealth Falcon May 2016)

technique_table_data.name: Query Registry
technique_table_data.descr: [Stealth Falcon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0038) malware attempts to determine the installed version of .NET by querying the Registry.(Citation: Citizen Lab Stealth Falcon May 2016)

subtechniques.name: Scheduled Task
subtechniques.descr: [Stealth Falcon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0038) malware creates a scheduled task entitled “IE Web Cache” to execute a malicious file hourly.(Citation: Citizen Lab Stealth Falcon May 2016)

technique_table_data.name: System Information Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [Stealth Falcon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0038) malware gathers system information via WMI, including the system directory, build number, serial number, version, manufacturer, model, and total physical memory.(Citation: Citizen Lab Stealth Falcon May 2016)

technique_table_data.name: System Network Configuration Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [Stealth Falcon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0038) malware gathers the Address Resolution Protocol (ARP) table from the victim.(Citation: Citizen Lab Stealth Falcon May 2016)

technique_table_data.name: System Owner/User Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [Stealth Falcon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0038) malware gathers the registered user and primary owner name via WMI.(Citation: Citizen Lab Stealth Falcon May 2016)

technique_table_data.name: Windows Management Instrumentation
technique_table_data.descr: [Stealth Falcon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0038) malware gathers system information via Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI).(Citation: Citizen Lab Stealth Falcon May 2016)

Citizen Lab Stealth Falcon May 2016.description: Marczak, B. and Scott-Railton, J.. (2016, May 29). Keep Calm and (Don’t) Enable Macros: A New Threat Actor Targets UAE Dissidents. Retrieved June 8, 2016.
